net.sf.gilead.core.serialization
Class GwtSerializer

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.gilead.core.serialization.GwtSerializer
Direct Known Subclasses:
GwtProxySerialization
public class GwtSerializer
extends java.lang.Object

GWT compatible serialization. Since Object class is not allowed, we replace it with a marker interface and encapsulates each basic supported types and collections in an implementation of the interface.

Author:
bruno.marchesson

convertToGwt

public IGwtSerializableParameter convertToGwt(java.io.Serializable serializable)
                                       throws SerializationException
Converts a serializable type to GWT supported encapsulation.

Throws:
SerializationException - if the serializable argument is not supported by GWT JRE.
